channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 台湾报告另一个疑似中国气象气球穿越台湾海峡
item.description: A suspected Chinese weather balloon flew across the sensitive Taiwan Strait on Monday but stayed well north of Taiwan, the island's defence ministry said on Tuesday, the third time this month Taipei has reported them nearby.翻译:台湾国防部周二表示，一个疑似中国气象气球周一飞越敏感的台湾海峡，但仍停留在台湾以北的地方，这是本月台北第三次报告称气球在附近。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日元等待日本央行关键结果；美元漂流
item.description: The yen rose broadly on Tuesday ahead of a policy decision from the Bank of Japan (BOJ) later in the day which some traders hope will prove crucial in determining if and when the central bank will move away from negative interest rates.翻译:周二，在日本央行(BOJ)稍后做出政策决定之前，日元普遍上涨，一些交易员希望该决定对于决定央行是否以及何时摆脱负利率至关重要。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 日本央行决定前日元和亚洲股市持谨慎态度
item.description: Asian shares and the yen steadied early on Tuesday as traders' focus turned on Japan's central bank and whether it might edge further away from its ultra-easy monetary policy, while global equities continued to cheer the prospect of U.S. rate cuts.翻译:亚洲股市和日元周二早盘企稳，交易者的注意力转向日本央行以及日本央行是否可能进一步远离超宽松货币政策，而全球股市继续看好美国降息的前景。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 美国未发现外国干预2022年中期选举的证据
item.description: A U.S. government report on Monday found that hackers linked to Russia and China targeted some election systems during the 2022 midterms, but found no evidence that foreign governments compromised the vote.翻译:美国政府周一的一份报告发现，与俄罗斯和中国有关的黑客在 2022 年中期选举期间针对一些选举系统进行了攻击，但没有发现外国政府破坏投票的证据。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 2024年中国经济能否重回正轨？
item.description: China's disappointing post-COVID recovery has raised significant doubts about the foundations of its decades of stunning growth and presented Beijing with a tough choice for 2024 and beyond: take on more debt or grow less.翻译:中国在新冠疫情后令人失望的复苏让人对其数十年惊人增长的基础产生了重大怀疑，并给北京带来了2024年及以后的艰难选择：承担更多债务还是减少增长。
item.author: Marius Zaharia

item.title: 曼钦寻求撤销财政部允许部分中国矿物用于电动汽车的豁免
item.description: The chair of the Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee wants Congress to vote on reversing the Treasury Department's electric vehicle tax credit guidance, saying it will increase U.S. reliance on China.翻译:参议院能源和自然资源委员会主席希望国会投票推翻财政部的电动汽车税收抵免指导，称这将增加美国对中国的依赖。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 国际货币基金组织理事批准贷款资源增加 50%，但持股比例不变
item.description: The International Monetary Fund's governing body has approved a 50% increase in quota resources to be contributed by member countries in proportion to their current IMF shareholding, bringing total quotas to $960 billion, the IMF said on Monday.翻译:国际货币基金组织(IMF)周一表示，该组织管理机构已批准成员国按其现有持股比例增加50%的配额资源，使总配额达到9600亿美元。
item.author: Andrea Shalal

item.title: 世贸组织改革计划上诉法院问题未得到解答
item.description: Countries including India and China on Monday voiced concern that a series of proposed reforms to the World Trade Organization leaves blank a section on rebooting its top appeals court, trade sources said, with time running out before a major meeting.翻译:贸易消息人士称，在重大会议召开之前的时间已经不多了，印度和中国等国家周一表达了担忧，认为世界贸易组织的一系列拟议改革在重启最高上诉法院的部分中留下了空白。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 立法者希望拜登拒绝向中国无人机制造商大疆创新颁发出口许可证
item.description: A group of 15 Republican lawmakers Monday asked the Pentagon to block export licenses for U.S. components for Chinese-drone manufacturer DJI, citing national security concerns.翻译:周一，由 15 名共和党议员组成的小组以国家安全为由，要求五角大楼阻止向中国无人机制造商大疆创新发放美国零部件的出口许可证。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: Forvia 计划在 AI-CEO 的帮助下，到 2028 年将研发成本减半
item.description: French car parts maker Forvia wants to cut its Research and development (R&D) costs by half by 2028 thanks mainly to generative artificial intelligence (AI) to keep up with electrification challenges and Asian competition in the automotive industry.翻译:法国汽车零部件制造商 Forvia 希望到 2028 年将其研发 (R&D) 成本削减一半，主要依靠生成人工智能 (AI)，以应对电气化挑战和亚洲汽车行业的竞争。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 官方媒体报道中国甘肃地震死亡人数上升至 111 人
item.description: At least 111 people were killed and more than 230 injured after an earthquake hit the Gansu-Qinghai border region in China on Tuesday, according to reports by state media.翻译:据官方媒体报道，周二中国甘青边境地区发生地震，造成至少 111 人死亡、230 多人受伤。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：LME 计划使用上海期货交易所价格制定新金属合约 - 消息来源
item.description: The London Metal Exchange (LME) is planning to launch new metals contracts using prices from the Shanghai Futures Exchange (ShFE), three industry sources familiar with the matter said, further increasing China's influence on global metals markets.翻译:三位知情人士表示，伦敦金属交易所（LME）计划使用上海期货交易所（ShFE）的价格推出新的金属合约，进一步增强中国对全球金属市场的影响力。
item.author: Pratima Desai, Siyi Liu

item.title: 独家：卡塔尔能源公司首席执行官表示新的液化天然气供应交易“即将到来”
item.description: QatarEnergy expects to agree new long-term liquefied natural gas supply deals in Asia and Europe, with several "imminent", its chief executive told Reuters.翻译:卡塔尔能源公司首席执行官告诉路透社，卡塔尔能源公司预计将在亚洲和欧洲达成新的长期液化天然气供应协议，其中几项“即将达成”。
item.author: Maha Dahan, Andrew Mills

item.title: 丰业银行墨西哥注目1.6万亿美元 北美贸易并非没有风险
item.description: Bank of Nova Scotia (Scotiabank) is eyeing North America's booming $1.6 trillion trade with its renewed Mexico bet, a strategy that offers hope but brings risks that have seen many global lenders including Citigroup Inc. scaling back.翻译:新斯科舍银行(Scotiabank)正着眼于北美蓬勃发展的1.6万亿美元贸易，并重新押注墨西哥，这一战略带来了希望，但也带来了风险，导致包括花旗集团在内的许多全球银行缩减了投资规模。
item.author: Nivedita Balu

item.title: 伦敦劳合社将保留其独特的总部至少到 2035 年
item.description: Lloyd's of London has said it will stay in its City tower until at least 2035 after the insurance market extended its lease with the building's owner, Chinese insurer Ping An.翻译:伦敦劳合社 (Lloyd's of London) 表示，在保险市场与该大楼业主中国平安保险公司延长租约后，该公司将继续保留其城市大厦至少到 2035 年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：尽管受到制裁，土耳其进口俄罗斯石油却节省了20亿美元
item.description: Turkey and Turkish companies have saved around $2 billion on energy bills in 2023 by raising imports of discounted Russian oil and refined products, Reuters calculation based on LSEG data and traders' estimates showed, and Ankara wants to buy more from its neighbour despite Western sanctions.翻译:路透社根据伦敦证券交易所集团数据和贸易商估计进行的计算显示，通过增加进口打折的俄罗斯石油和成品油，土耳其和土耳其企业在 2023 年节省了约 20 亿美元的能源费用，尽管西方制裁，安卡拉仍希望从邻国购买更多产品。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德国央行发现德国企业对中国的担忧推高了成本
item.description: Years of effort by German companies to diversify their supply chains is pushing up costs and further increases are still in the pipeline, especially for firms with ties to China, the Bundesbank said on Monday after surveying 8400 businesses.翻译:德国央行在对 8400 家企业进行调查后周一表示，德国企业多年来为实现供应链多元化所做的努力正在推高成本，而且进一步的上涨仍在酝酿之中，尤其是与中国有联系的企业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 特朗普将任命效忠者来重塑美国对中国、北约和乌克兰的外交政策
item.description: Donald Trump in a second term would likely install loyalists in key positions in the Pentagon, State Department and CIA whose primary allegiance would be to him, allowing him more freedom than in his first presidency to enact isolationist policies and whims.翻译:唐纳德·特朗普在第二个任期内可能会在五角大楼、国务院和中央情报局的关键职位上任​​命忠诚者，他们的主要效忠对象是他，这让他比第一任总统有更多的自由来制定孤立主义政策和突发奇想。
item.author: Gram Slattery, Simon Lewis, Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart

item.title: 特朗普的外交政策：重新思考北约、向墨西哥增兵、提高关税
item.description: Republican former President Donald Trump is planning to fundamentally alter America's relationship with Europe should he win a second term in office. On the campaign trail, he has also floated sending armed forces into Mexico to battle drug cartels and slapping expansive tariffs on friends and foes alike.翻译:共和党前总统唐纳德·特朗普计划如果赢得连任，将从根本上改变美国与欧洲的关系。在竞选过程中，他还提出派遣武装部队进入墨西哥打击贩毒集团，并对朋友和敌人征收高额关税。
item.author: Gram Slattery

item.title: 朝鲜在谴责美国“战争”举动后发射洲际弹道导弹
item.description: North Korea fired an intercontinental ballistic missile on Monday that has a range to hit anywhere in the United States, said South Korea and Japan, marking its second launch in hours as Pyongyang condemned a U.S.-led show of force as "war" moves.翻译:韩国和日本表示，朝鲜周一发射了一枚洲际弹道导弹，射程可覆盖美国任何地方，这是几小时内的第二次发射，平壤谴责美国主导的武力展示是“战争”的举动。
item.author: Soo-Hyang Choi, Kantaro Komiya
